title: Dark Age Music Pack
description: The Dark Age Music Pack is an adaptive music asset pack for Scy-Fy / Dark Fantasy themed games.
longDescription:
The Dark Age Music Pack is suitable for Scy-Fy / Dark Fantasy themed games where action and adventure are present.


Listen Demo Soundtracks

Listen Demo Pre-made Sequence


Main Soundtracks ( 22:42 min )

- OST1 Wrong Call , 3:13 min

- OST5 The Gate V5 , 2:26 min

- OST5 The Gate , 2:26 min

- OST7 The Last Action , 2:30 min

- OST7 The Last Action V2 , 2:30 min

- OST9 Meet The Alien V2 , 3:01 min

- OST9 Meet The Alien V3 , 3:09 min

- OST9 Meet The Alien , 3:23 min


Pre-made Sequences ( 28:27 min )

All those full long Sequence are done with only the stem and audio loops

- Darkness , 2:03 min

- Darkness 2 , 2:03 min

- K1 , 1:25 min

- K2 , 1:32 min

- Artificial Human , 1:09 min

- No Time 1 , 1:12 min

- No Time 2 , 1:52 min

- Tribal Alien , 1:58 min

- Approch , 1:27 min

- Breaking Heart , 1:56 min

- Data Acess , 0:58 min

- E1 , 1:56 min

- F1 , 1:56 min

- Gltichy Heart , 1:56 min

- Heart of Alien , 1:56 min

- Jazzy Mood , 3:01 min
technicalDetails:
Adaptive music ( dynamic / modular music )

In addition to 3 of all main soundtracks you also have the pre-made sequence with stem audio and short Loops ( and seamless ); all loops are exchangeable, allowing you to trigger them to the player's actions.


Loops and Stem Audio

  • 80 loops to build or rebuilt your own track
  • 100 audio files to make your own original loops or use as a layer instrument
  • each loop audio and stem above 29 sec and 32 sec


Sample rate / bit rate: Wavs 44.1Khz 16 bits Stereo

with optimized Dynamic Range audio ( DR8/DR13 )


  • Number of Audio Wavs: 196
  • Number of Audio Cues: 196
  • Does music loop: Yes
  • Minutes of audio provided ( all assets ): 119 min
  • Documentation: user guide come with a tutorial
  • documentation: see online


Intended Platforms: All
